verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD. <S%H3050><s%> O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he is good: <S%H2896><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> can utter <S%H4448><s%> the mighty acts <S%H1369><s%> of the LORD? <S%H3068><s%> who can show forth <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his praise? <S%H8416><s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are they that keep <S%H8104><s%> judgment, <S%H4941><s%> and he that doeth <S%H6213><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> at all <S%H3605><s%> times. <S%H6256><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> with the favor <S%H7522><s%> that thou bearest unto thy people: <S%H5971><s%> O visit <S%H6485><s%> me with thy salvation; <S%H3444><s%>

That I may see <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> of thy chosen, <S%H972><s%> that I may rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in the gladness <S%H8057><s%> of thy nation, <S%H1471><s%> that I may glory <S%H1984><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thine inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
We have sinned <S%H2398><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> our fathers, <S%H1><s%> we have committed iniquity, <S%H5753><s%> we have done wickedly. <S%H7561><s%>

Our fathers <S%H1><s%> understood <S%H7919><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> thy wonders <S%H6381><s%> in Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> they remembered <S%H2142><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of thy mercies; <S%H2617><s%> but provoked <S%H4784><s%> him at <S%H5921><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> even at the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%>
Nevertheless he saved <S%H3467><s%> them for his name's sake, <S%H4616><s%> <S%H8034><s%> that he might make <S%H853><s%> his mighty power <S%H1369><s%> to be known. <S%H3045><s%>

He rebuked <S%H1605><s%> the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> also, and it was dried up: <S%H2717><s%> so he led <S%H1980><s%> them through the depths, <S%H8415><s%> as through the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And he saved <S%H3467><s%> them from the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of him that hated <S%H8130><s%> them, and redeemed <S%H1350><s%> them from the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy. <S%H341><s%>
And the waters <S%H4325><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> their enemies: <S%H6862><s%> there was not <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them left. <S%H3498><s%>
Then believed <S%H539><s%> they his words; <S%H1697><s%> they sang <S%H7891><s%> his praise. <S%H8416><s%>
They soon <S%H4116><s%> forgot <S%H7911><s%> his works; <S%H4639><s%> they waited <S%H2442><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> for his counsel: <S%H6098><s%>
But lusted exceedingly <S%H183><s%> <S%H8378><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and tempted <S%H5254><s%> God <S%H410><s%> in the desert. <S%H3452><s%>
And he gave <S%H5414><s%> them their request; <S%H7596><s%> but sent <S%H7971><s%> leanness <S%H7332><s%> into their soul. <S%H5315><s%>
They envied <S%H7065><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> also in the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> the saint <S%H6918><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
The earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> and swallowed up <S%H1104><s%> Dathan, <S%H1885><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the company <S%H5712><s%> of Abiram. <S%H48><s%>
And a fire <S%H784><s%> was kindled <S%H1197><s%> in their company; <S%H5712><s%> the flame <S%H3852><s%> burned up <S%H3857><s%> the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
They made <S%H6213><s%> a calf <S%H5695><s%> in Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> the molten image. <S%H4541><s%>
Thus they changed <S%H4171><s%> <S%H853><s%> their glory <S%H3519><s%> into the similitude <S%H8403><s%> of an ox <S%H7794><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> grass. <S%H6212><s%>
They forgot <S%H7911><s%> God <S%H410><s%> their savior, <S%H3467><s%> which had done <S%H6213><s%> great things <S%H1419><s%> in Egypt; <S%H4714><s%>
Wondrous works <S%H6381><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and terrible things <S%H3372><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%>

Therefore he said <S%H559><s%> that he would destroy <S%H8045><s%> them, had not <S%H3884><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> his chosen <S%H972><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him in the breach, <S%H6556><s%> to turn away <S%H7725><s%> his wrath, <S%H2534><s%> lest he should destroy <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7843><s%> them.
Yea, they despised <S%H3988><s%> the pleasant <S%H2532><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> they believed <S%H539><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> his word: <S%H1697><s%>
But murmured <S%H7279><s%> in their tents, <S%H168><s%> and hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Therefore he lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> against them, to overthrow <S%H5307><s%> them in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%>
To overthrow <S%H5307><s%> their seed <S%H2233><s%> also among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and to scatter <S%H2219><s%> them in the lands. <S%H776><s%>
They joined themselves <S%H6775><s%> also unto Baalpeor, <S%H1187><s%> and ate <S%H398><s%> the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of the dead. <S%H4191><s%>
Thus they provoked him to anger <S%H3707><s%> with their inventions: <S%H4611><s%> and the plague <S%H4046><s%> broke in <S%H6555><s%> upon them.
Then stood up <S%H5975><s%> Phinehas, <S%H6372><s%> and executed judgment: <S%H6419><s%> and so the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed. <S%H6113><s%>
And that was counted <S%H2803><s%> unto him for righteousness <S%H6666><s%> unto all generations <S%H1755><s%> <S%H1755><s%> forevermore. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>
They angered <S%H7107><s%> him also at <S%H5921><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of strife, <S%H4808><s%> so that it went ill <S%H3415><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%> for their sakes: <S%H5668><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> they provoked <S%H4784><s%> <S%H853><s%> his spirit, <S%H7307><s%> so that he spoke unadvisedly <S%H981><s%> with his lips. <S%H8193><s%>
They did not <S%H3808><s%> destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H853><s%> the nations, <S%H5971><s%> concerning whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H559><s%> them:
But were mingled <S%H6148><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and learned <S%H3925><s%> their works. <S%H4639><s%>
And they served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> their idols: <S%H6091><s%> which were <S%H1961><s%> a snare <S%H4170><s%> unto them.
Yea, they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H853><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto devils, <S%H7700><s%>

And shed <S%H8210><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> even the blood <S%H1818><s%> of their sons <S%H1121><s%> and of their daughters, <S%H1323><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> unto the idols <S%H6091><s%> of Canaan: <S%H3667><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> was polluted <S%H2610><s%> with blood. <S%H1818><s%>
Thus were they defiled <S%H2930><s%> with their own works, <S%H4639><s%> and went a whoring <S%H2181><s%> with their own inventions. <S%H4611><s%>

Therefore was the wrath <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> kindled <S%H2734><s%> against his people, <S%H5971><s%> insomuch that he abhorred <S%H8581><s%> <S%H853><s%> his own inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
And he gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the heathen; <S%H1471><s%> and they that hated <S%H8130><s%> them ruled <S%H4910><s%> over them.
Their enemies <S%H341><s%> also oppressed <S%H3905><s%> them, and they were brought into subjection <S%H3665><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> their hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Many <S%H7227><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> did he deliver <S%H5337><s%> them; but they <S%H1992><s%> provoked <S%H4784><s%> him with their counsel, <S%H6098><s%> and were brought low <S%H4355><s%> for their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
Nevertheless he regarded <S%H7200><s%> their affliction, <S%H6862><s%> when he heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> their cry: <S%H7440><s%>
And he remembered <S%H2142><s%> for them his covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and repented <S%H5162><s%> according to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his mercies. <S%H2617><s%>
He made <S%H5414><s%> them also to be pitied <S%H7356><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> those that carried them captives. <S%H7617><s%>

Save <S%H3467><s%> us, O LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> us from among <S%H4480><s%> the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thy holy <S%H6944><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> and to triumph <S%H7623><s%> in thy praise. <S%H8416><s%>

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> everlasting <S%H5769><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> everlasting: <S%H5769><s%> and let all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD. <S%H3050><s%>
